Detailed Description

cvmx_ilk_rx::_mem_cal1

Notes: Software must program the calendar table prior to enabling the link.

Software must always write ILK_RXx_MEM_CAL0 then ILK_RXx_MEM_CAL1. Software must never write them in reverse order or write one without writing the other.

A given calendar table entry has no effect on PKO pipe backpressure when either:

  • ENTRY_CTLx=Link (1), or
  • ENTRY_CTLx=XON (3) and PORT_PIPEx is outside the range of ILK_TXx_PIPE[BASE/NUMP].

Within the 8 calendar table entries of one IDX value, if more than one affects the same PKO pipe, XOFF always wins over XON, regardless of the calendar table order.

Software must always read ILK_RXx_MEM_CAL0 then ILK_Rx_MEM_CAL1. Software must never read them in reverse order or read one without reading the other.
